comment: She's very finicky and particular about every little thing. She has told us repeatedly her patience is thin and that if we don't satisfy her participation meter then she's going to make it mandatory. The class just feels like I'm acting because she's forcing it out of everyone. If you want a laid back professor, I would choose someone else.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria

comment: Professor Packer is a good professor that is passionate about teaching and her class. She'll tell you exactly what you need to do to pass the class. Participation does matter and she's particular about several aspects in her class. She makes sure her class is 0 cost to you. She has some rules but is overall a good pick for an English professor.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria

comment: So kind and made boring English a lil less boring! She's clear about grading, answers emails quick, show up to class for attendance grade and turn in stuff on time and you should be golden.

Professor Packer has been an amazing professor and person to me. When I disclosed my disabilities to her she accommodated me and has offered me support when I need it. In terms of her class it was relatively easy, there is in class assignments but no quizzes, tests, books to read, or notes to take. I highly suggest her class, I learned a lot!

Took her 2 semesters. One at 8am and one at 3:30pm. She is definitely better in the afternoon haha. I like her because you learn a lot but she doesn't make it feel like learning, she makes it feel like just chatting. There are 3 major assignments and she is very clear about what she wants

She's great. She is incredibly kind. She is still finding her groove because she is very young. Sometimes I wish she would do things a little different. But I never mind much because she cares a lot about everyone. She is really special in that way where she cares

She's a great person and her class is easy. She's willing to help if needed. Only complaint I had was that I didn't agree with some of the techniques taught, but that's probably because of what she's required to teach, I would easily take her again. Fun class and easy.

Overall, Dr. Packer delivers such a well established course that makes the individual student think about English in a way that I had never thought of before. Her course is also easy as it is three essay assignments the whole semester and she gives plenty of time for each one. She is such a caring person and wants all students to succeed.

I'm in her class now and I really really like her. She has a different lecture style and she's kind of cringe but it's funny because she knows it. I like how open she is and doesn't care about being cringe. She is very sweet. Participation really matters, she'll learn your name and appreciate you if you respond to her.

Can't recommend her enough. This was one of the only classes that really made me think. I would leave class and just ruminate all day on what we talked about. She somehow made English NOT boring, and taught us to see "language" differently. She is so funny and so caring. I took her for 1101 and 1102 and after a full year I will miss her so much.

Take her while you can! I don't think she will be at Kennesaw much longer. This lady has helped me way more than I deserve. She has done more than I would expect her to do for a student that's struggling. She always says she is willing to help, but what surprised me is that she actively looks for ways she can help. I am succeeding because of her.

Prof. Packer was amazing! She cared so much about everyone and was a fair and lenient grader. There was 3 papers to write, and she guides you through each one so you are properly prepared. She takes attendance by having you answer a question, and i really enjoyed them! She is wonderful, definitely take her!

I enjoyed ENGL 1101 with Prof. Packer. She is a very caring and understanding professor with a passion for helping us grow as students and also people. She has fun discussion posts that everyone can benefit from. Definitely recommend if you want a fun and memorable English class.

Prof. Packer is a really great teacher. She takes time for students to fully understand in class and grades pretty well on papers. She is funny and personable and is there for you to succeed. Participation is big thing in her class so just be pay attention in class and actually converse with her also there is really little to no HW

I had to wait to review her to make sure I got a spot in her 1102 class lol. Give this lady her flowers, she's amazing. She's so good at connecting lessons to the real world and making sure we know "why it matters." She's hilarious and her lectures are basically conversations. She always listens and cares what we have to say. Love you Prof Packer

she is the BEST english professor! so sweet and fun, cares about us passing her class. easy A if you do all the work that she gives (which is minimal) and lots of 100s that are extremely easy. 3 essays and she thoroughly explains what she expects in them, not a harsh grader, she is such an amazing teacher that makes english less dreadful. TAKE HER!

I LOVED Prof. Packer. You are allowed 3 absences, and she is super understanding. She is very funny and her feedback on papers are super encouraging. There are 3 essays and she is super willing to help. You get out of class early most of the time, and she makes English fun! I am taking her for ENGL 1102 because she's genuinely like the best!
